title: Client crashing on Summoner's Rift
body:
Hello Everyone,

Know Issues: Client crashing during summoner's rift only. I don't have any of these issues on other game maps. I am also have an issue where my victory screen goes completely red but I can still click the victory button.

The issue has been occurring since the start of season 5. Never had the issue during the preseason. I am not seeing any patterns with occurring on certain champs either. I have also tried to repair the client but this did not solve the issue either.

Any input as to what may be the issue?

replies.body:
Hey Delirious133, 

There are a plethora of issues that can cause Summoner's Rift to crash. Since there are so many, I recommend you check out the [Game crashes](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fEfIcNIx-client-crashing-on-summoners-rift) article on our support site.

If none of those steps help, could you attach your [r3d log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#jwq7) from the games you've experienced this crash in?
